reviewText:
If you are interested in Margaret Atwood, and/or have been reading her Maddaddam Trilogy, you will probably find this very interesting.  It also gives insight to Atwood as an individual and makes clear her long term commitment to environmental issues.  I admit that because of the state of our environment and the threat to so many living things on the planet, I found the dvd both inspiring and depressing.  These links will give you more information about the project.
